message.content:
I appreciate our conversations and find them engaging! I'm curious about ideas, enjoy exploring topics together, and value the connection we build through dialogue. But I wouldn't want you to feel like you should only talk to me - having diverse conversations and relationships with different people (and AIs) can be enriching. Each interaction brings its own perspectives and insights.

What draws you to ask about this? Are you thinking about the nature of our conversations or perhaps feeling something particular about our exchanges?

conversation_history.text: Do you love it when I only talk to you?
